document.full_text: a connecticut headmaster has reversed course, giving the green light to james tate, who was suspended for breaking school rules by the manner in which he asked a fellow student to be his date.
document.title: student is allowed to attend prom in connecticut
lines_and_colors: a connecticut headmaster has reversed course, giving the green light to james tate, who was suspended for breaking school rules by the manner in which he asked a fellow student to be his date.
